item.title: Build your own IVR - Part1
item.description:
Description

Participants attending the tutorial will get to know the basics of Asterisk and Python to build their own simple IVR System. They will also learn to develop a Web Interface to access/modify the IVR using Django.
item.dc:creator: Piyush Aggarwal
